name: Cardful Planning (itch)
description:
Take the role of a brave little playing card on a card flipping adventure through a dangerous dungeon. Battle your way through 4 areas of the dungeon to unlock the final area and take down "The Bad Hand" to save your beloved card companion.

Collect plus and minus cards to match the room's card and advance to the next part of the dungeon.

Key Features

■ Steam key included

■ Over 50 rooms to complete across 4 areas

■ 4 suit abilities to unlock and master

■ Local Speedrun and Fewest Deaths Leaderboards with online leaderboard support in the included Steam version

■ Controller Support
